name: Le Chat Fonce: Petite Adventure 2
description:
Previously...

Chat Foncé gather all the 100 fireflies!
Now he just needs to get some sodas
and meet with his friends for the party!

(: can you help him?

WASD or Arrows to move/Jump

After collecting all the money, just back o the soda machine to win!

Game Made by Roberto Romao

Soundtrack by Eric Matyas
http://soundimage.org/
